verses.verse: Then the heads<WH7218> of households of the Levites<WH1> approached<WH3881> Eleazar<WH5066> the priest<WH499> and Joshua<WH3548> the son<WH3091> of Nun<WH1121> and the heads<WH5126> of households of the tribes<WH7218> of the sons<WH1> of Israel.<WH4294>

And they spoke<WH1696> to them at Shiloh<WH7887> in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> saying,<WH559> "The Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> through<WH3027> Moses<WH4872> to give<WH5414> us cities<WH5892> to live<WH3427> in, with their pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> for our cattle.<WH929>"

So the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> gave<WH5414> the Levites<WH3881> from their inheritance<WH5159> these<WH428> cities<WH5892> with their pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054> according<WH413> to the command<WH6310> of the Lord.<WH3068>

Then the lot<WH1486> came<WH3318> out for the families<WH4940> of the Kohathites.<WH6956> And the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest,<WH3548> who were of the Levites,<WH3881> received<WH1961> thirteen<WH7969> <WH6240> cities<WH5892> by lot<WH1486> from the tribe<WH4294> of Judah<WH3063> and from the tribe<WH4294> of the Simeonites<WH8099> and from the tribe<WH4294> of Benjamin.<WH1144>

And the rest<WH3498> of the sons<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> received ten<WH6235> cities<WH5892> by lot<WH1486> from the families<WH4940> of the tribe<WH4294> of Ephraim<WH669> and from the tribe<WH4294> of Dan<WH1835> and from the half-tribe of Manasseh.<WH4519>

And the sons<WH1121> of Gershon<WH1648> received thirteen<WH7969> <WH6240> cities<WH5892> by lot<WH1486> from the families<WH4940> of the tribe<WH4294> of Issachar<WH3485> and from the tribe<WH4294> of Asher<WH836> and from the tribe<WH4294> of Naphtali<WH5321> and from the half-tribe of Manasseh<WH4519> in Bashan.<WH1316>

The sons<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> according to their families<WH4940> received twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> cities<WH5892> from the tribe<WH4294> of Reuben<WH7205> and from the tribe<WH4294> of Gad<WH1410> and from the tribe<WH4294> of Zebulun.<WH2074>

Now the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> gave<WH5414> by lot<WH1486> to the Levites<WH3881> these<WH428> cities<WH5892> with their pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> through<WH3027> Moses.<WH4872>

And they gave<WH5414> these<WH428> cities<WH5892> which<WH834> are [here] mentioned<WH7121> by name<WH8034> from the tribe<WH4294> of the sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> and from the tribe<WH4294> of the sons<WH1121> of Simeon;<WH8095>
and they were for the sons<WH1121> of Aaron,<WH175> one of the families<WH4940> of the Kohathites,<WH6956> of the sons<WH1121> of Levi,<WH3878> for the lot<WH1486> was theirs<WH1992> first.<WH7223>

Thus they gave<WH5414> them Kiriath-arba, [Arba being] the father of Anak<WH1> (that is, Hebron<WH6061>), in the hill<WH2275> country<WH2022> of Judah,<WH2022> with its surrounding<WH3063> pasture<WH5439> lands.<WH4054>
But the fields<WH7704> of the city<WH5892> and its villages,<WH9161> they gave<WH5414> to Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> as his possession.<WH272>

So to the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548> they gave<WH5414> Hebron,<WH2275> the city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the manslayer,<WH7523> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054> and Libnah<WH3841> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054>
and Jattir<WH3492> with its pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> and Eshtemoa<WH851> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054>
and Holon<WH2473> with its pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> and Debir<WH1688> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054>

and Ain<WH5871> with its pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> and Juttah<WH3194> with its pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> [and] Beth-shemesh with its pasture<WH4054> lands;<WH4054> nine<WH8672> cities<WH5892> from these<WH428> two<WH8147> tribes.<WH7626>
And from the tribe<WH4294> of Benjamin,<WH1144> Gibeon<WH1391> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054> Geba<WH1387> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054>
Anathoth<WH6068> with its pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> and Almon<WH5960> with its pasture<WH4054> lands;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities.<WH5892>
All<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> of the sons<WH1121> of Aaron,<WH175> the priests,<WH3548> were thirteen<WH7969> <WH6240> cities<WH5892> with their pasture<WH4054> lands.<WH4054>

Then the cities<WH5892> from the tribe<WH4294> of Ephraim<WH669> were allotted<WH1486> to the families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of Kohath,<WH6955> the Levites,<WH3881> [even to] the rest<WH3498> of the sons<WH1121> of Kohath.<WH6955>

And they gave<WH5414> them Shechem,<WH7927> the city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the manslayer,<WH7523> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054> in the hill<WH2022> country<WH2022> of Ephraim,<WH669> and Gezer<WH1507> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054>
and Kibzaim<WH6911> with its pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> and Beth-horon with its pasture<WH4054> lands;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities.<WH5892>
And from the tribe<WH4294> of Dan,<WH1835> Elteke<WH514> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054> Gibbethon<WH1405> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054>
Aijalon<WH357> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054> Gath-rimmon with its pasture<WH4054> lands;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities.<WH5892>
And from the half-tribe of Manasseh,<WH4519> [they allotted] Taanach<WH8590> with its pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> and Gath-rimmon with its pasture<WH4054> lands;<WH4054> two<WH8147> cities.<WH5892>
All<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> with their pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> for the families<WH4940> of the rest<WH3498> of the sons<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> were ten.<WH6235>

And to the sons<WH1121> of Gershon,<WH1648> one of the families<WH4940> of the Levites,<WH3881> from the half-tribe of Manasseh,<WH4519> [they gave] Golan<WH1474> in Bashan,<WH1316> the city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the manslayer,<WH7523> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054> and Be-eshterah with its pasture<WH4054> lands;<WH4054> two<WH8147> cities.<WH5892>
And from the tribe<WH4294> of Issachar,<WH3485> [they gave] Kishion<WH7191> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054> Daberath<WH1705> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054>
Jarmuth<WH3412> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054> En-gannim with its pasture<WH4054> lands;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities.<WH5892>
And from the tribe<WH4294> of Asher,<WH836> [they gave] Mishal<WH4861> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054> Abdon<WH5658> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054>
Helkath<WH2520> with its pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> and Rehob<WH7340> with its pasture<WH4054> lands;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities.<WH5892>

And from the tribe<WH4294> of Naphtali,<WH5321> [they gave] Kedesh<WH6943> in Galilee,<WH1551> the city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the manslayer,<WH7523> with its pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> and Hammoth-dor with its pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> and Kartan<WH7178> with its pasture<WH4054> lands;<WH4054> three<WH7969> cities.<WH5892>
All<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> of the Gershonites<WH1649> according to their families<WH4940> were thirteen<WH7969> <WH6240> cities<WH5892> with their pasture<WH4054> lands.<WH4054>

And to the families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of Merari,<WH4847> the rest<WH3498> of the Levites,<WH3881> [they gave] from the tribe<WH4294> of Zebulun,<WH2074> Jokneam<WH3362> with its pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> and Kartah<WH7177> with its pasture<WH4054> lands.<WH4054>
Dimnah<WH1829> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054> Nahalal<WH5096> with its pasture<WH4054> lands;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities.<WH5892>
And from the tribe<WH4294> of Reuben,<WH7205> [they gave] Bezer<WH1221> with its pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> and Jahaz<WH3096> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054>
Kedemoth<WH6932> with its pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> and Mephaath<WH4158> with its pasture<WH4054> lands;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities.<WH5892>

And from the tribe<WH4294> of Gad,<WH1410> [they gave] Ramoth<WH7216> in Gilead,<WH1568> the city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the manslayer,<WH7523> with its pasture<WH4054> lands<WH4054> and Mahanaim<WH4266> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054>
Heshbon<WH2809> with its pasture<WH4054> lands,<WH4054> Jazer<WH3270> with its pasture<WH4054> lands;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities<WH5892> in all.<WH3605>

All<WH3605> [these were] the cities<WH5892> of the sons<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> according to their families,<WH4940> the rest<WH3498> of the families<WH4940> of the Levites;<WH3881> and their lot<WH1486> was twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> cities.<WH5892>

All<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> of the Levites<WH3881> in the midst<WH8432> of the possession<WH272> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were forty-eight cities<WH5892> with their pasture<WH4054> lands.<WH4054>
These<WH428> cities<WH5892> each<WH5892> had<WH1961> its surrounding<WH5439> pasture<WH4054> lands;<WH4054> thus<WH3651> [it was] with all<WH3605> these<WH428> cities.<WH5892>
So the Lord<WH3068> gave<WH5414> Israel<WH3478> all<WH3605> the land<WH776> which<WH834> He had sworn<WH7650> to give<WH5414> to their fathers, and they possessed<WH1> it and lived<WH3423> in it.

And the Lord<WH3068> gave<WH5117> them rest<WH5117> on every<WH5439> side,<WH5439> according to all<WH3605> that He had sworn<WH7650> to their fathers, and no<WH1> one<WH3808> of all<WH376> their enemies<WH3605> stood<WH340> before<WH5975> them; the Lord<WH6440> gave<WH3068> all<WH5414> their enemies<WH3605> into their hand.<WH340>
Not one<WH1697> of the good<WH2896> promises<WH1697> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> had made<WH1696> to the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> failed;<WH5307> all<WH3605> came<WH935> to pass.<WH935>
